meka.gui.modelviewer.renderers

Class AbstractObjectRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • meka.gui.modelviewer.renderers.AbstractObjectRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InstancesRenderer, MultiLabelClassifierRenderer, PlainTextRenderer

    public abstract class AbstractObjectRenderer
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Ancestor for classes that render objects visually.
    Version:
    $Revision: 10971 $
    Author:
    fracpete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz)
    See Also:
